name: Utility privatisation
description: Sector of the power market open to private participation.

name: Power plant fleet modernisation program
description: Does the power generation fleet of the country need investment?

name: Gap to target
description: How large is the gap between the current level of renewables in the power sector and the country's closest target?

name: Upcoming auctions
description: What is the volume of auctions announced in the country over the period 2018-2022 as a share of installed capacity?

name: Wholesale price distortions
description: Are fossil fuels generators benefiting from subsidies that affect the price at which they can sell electricity onto the wholesale market?

name: Currency variation
description: How high is the ten year variation of the local currency against the US dollar?

name: Offtaker risk
description: How high is the offtake risk for independent generators?

name: Standardised PPAs
description: Are power purchase agreements standardised in the market?

name: PPAs of sufficient duration
description: Are PPAs of sufficient duration to be bankable for renewables developers?

name: Purchase obligation
description: Is the offtaker obliged to pay for all the renewables output of generators?

name: Mini-grids: licensing
description: Is it legally possible to set up a mini-grid or small power project incl. for self use?

name: Kerosene and diesel subsidies
description: Are retail diesel and kerosene prices subsidised?

name: Curtailment risk
description: Are renewables projects at risk of seeing their production curtailed?

name: Foreign investment
description: Disclosed share of foreign investment in the clean energy sector.

name: Electricity Price Data
description: Average residential electricity in the country

name: Clean Energy Investment
description: What's the volume of clean energy investment in the country over the last five years?
